set(BIT_LITE_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bit-lite")

UpdateExternalLib("bit-lite" "https://github.com/martinmoene/bit-lite.git" "4ca559a3f72a04a99bbfd10bd7bd5472fa7cd29c")

set(BIT_LITE_OPT_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BIT_LITE_OPT_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BIT_LITE_OPT_SELECT_NONSTD ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BIT_LITE_OPT_SELECT_STD OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(${BIT_LITE_PROJECT_DIR} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bit-lite" EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
